briefTitle: Decision Support Following Genetic Testing for Breast-Ovarian Cancer Susceptibility
officialTitle: Decision Making Interventions for Women Receiving Uninformative BRCA1/2 Test Results or Positive BRCA1/2 Test Results
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Undergo BRCA1/2 genetic counseling and testing at one of four study sites
* Receive positive or uninformative test results
* English speaking

Exclusion Criteria:

* Newly diagnosed breast cancer patients who have not yet initiated definitive breast cancer treatment
* Previous bilateral mastectomy
